This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test for prerequisites. 
PASS A style rule with a type selector should only invalidate elements with that type. 
PASS A type selector scoped in an unknown id should not invalidate any elements. 
PASS A type selector scoped by a known id should only invalidate descendants of the element with that id. 
PASS A style rule with a custom pseudo element should only invalidate custom pseudo elements. 
PASS A custom pseudo element scoped in an unknown id should not invalidate any elements. 
PASS A custom pseudo element scoped in a known id should only invalidate descendants of the element with that id. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
